title: 95: Breakup Broads
itunes:title: 95: Breakup Broads
description:
The Broads discuss that tough, tough topic - breakups. First, they chat about all the recent breakups in Bach Nation - then they dive into personal breakup stories, the DON'Ts of breakups, dumper versus dumpee, answer some #broadsquad questions, and much more.
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:
